short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: twitterAdRemover is a little extension removes twt add twts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply removes twitter promotional ad's divs just after first load. Extension also checks every second and every page scroll (new ads might be loaded) than remove ad's div again.
